ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nnsgrp.m | |- M = ( CCfld |`s NN ) |
| 2 |  | #P_1nn | |- 1 e. NN |
| 3 |  | #P_nnaddcl | |- ( ( x e. NN /\ y e. NN ) -> ( x + y ) e. NN ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_rgen2a | |- A. x e. NN A. y e. NN ( x + y ) e. NN |
| 5 |  | #P_nnsscn | |- NN C_ CC |
| 6 | 1 | #P_cnfldsrngbas | |- ( NN C_ CC -> NN = ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_ax-mp | |- NN = ( Base ` M ) |
| 8 |  | #P_nnex | |- NN e. _V |
| 9 | 1 | #P_cnfldsrngadd | |- ( NN e. _V -> + = ( +g ` M ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_ax-mp | |- + = ( +g ` M ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_ismgmn0 | |- ( 1 e. NN -> ( M e. Mgm <-> A. x e. NN A. y e. NN ( x + y ) e. NN ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( 1 e. NN -> M e. Mgm ) |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_ax-mp | |- M e. Mgm |
